price: Basi Mwenyezi Mungu akawaonjesha hizaya katika uhai wa duniani. Na bila ya shaka adhabu ya Akhera ni kubwa zaidi; laiti wangeli jua!
arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akawaonjesha unyonge katika maisha ya duniani. Ninaapa: Hakika adhabu ya Akhera ni kubwa zaidi kuliko ya duniani, lau kwamba walikuwa ni watu wa kujua na kuangalia!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
